description:
The Snowcrew Down Jacket features bluesign® approved, recycled, and RDS-approved materials to deliver superior insulation for cold weather skiing and snowboarding. Responsibly sourced 700+ fill power down insulation offers superior warmth, while waterproof and windproof Ventia shell fabric protects you from the elements. VerticalX Eco synthetic insulation provides additional warmth and breathability, and pit zips offer ventilation when hiking to the secret stash.

A powder skirt and hood with a halo design keep snow out, and multiple pockets store all your essentials. Other intuitive design additions include a forearm pass pocket and a key clip. Constructed for cold weather resort riding and backed by the OR Ambassador team, The Snowcrew Down Jacket provides superior responsibly sourced warmth.
name: Outdoor Research Snowcrew Down Jacket - Mens

specs.value: bluesign® approved Ventia® 2L 100% Polyester (56% Recycled) 75D X 150D Plain Weave Mechanical Stretch
VerticalX Eco™ 100% Polyester (85% Recycled) Insulation 150 G
